mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Norfolk, Va. and vicinity
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bowman, Sam. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by Sam. W. Bowman, Manufacturing Stationer
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 56 x 45 cm. on sheet 61 x 48 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map covers the area from West Norfolk to Tanners Creek, and identifies property owned by the various land development companies in the area.
Text in lower margin provides facts and statistics about Norfolk.
"Myers & Co., Real Estate, Norfolk, Va." stamped in red in upper right of map, inside neatline. Some information has been added to the map in red ink.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: some text has been lost at an old fold line. Linen-backed. Gift of James S. Easley.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real estate development--Virginia--Norfolk--Maps.
Norfolk (Va.)--Maps.
